newsticker-summary: Description appearing on top of Special:NewsTicker
newsticker-general: Title of the general settings section in the special page
newsticker-news: Label for the input where news are set
newsticker-width: Label for the input where the news ticker width is set
newsticker-height: Label for the input where the news ticker height is set
newsticker-pages: Label for the input where the number of pages with the news ticker is set
newsticker-page1: Title of the first page section in the special page
newsticker-page2: Title of the second page section in the special page
newsticker-page3: Title of the third page section in the special page
newsticker-page4: Title of the fourth page section in the special page
newsticker-page5: Title of the fifth page section in the special page
newsticker-page6: Title of the sixth page section in the special page
newsticker-page7: Title of the seventh page section in the special page
newsticker-page8: Title of the eight page section in the special page
newsticker-page9: Title of the ninth page section in the special page
newsticker-title: Label for input where the title o the page is set
newsticker-add-page: Label for the button for adding another page
newsticker-default-news-help: Help text for the input where the default news are set
newsticker-default-width-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker default width is set
newsticker-default-height-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker default height is set
newsticker-pages-help: Help text for the input where the number of pages with the news ticker is set
newsticker-title-help: Help text for the input where the title of the page with the news ticker is set
newsticker-news-help: Help text for the input where the news are set
newsticker-width-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker width is set
newsticker-height-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker height is set
